events.message: I reported the car collision that happened on 2024-03-30 to begin the insurance claim process.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the vehicle damage reported.
An agent has been assigned to my case and contacted me to discuss the details of the accident.
Received confirmation that the insurance company has acknowledged my claim for the vehicle collision.
The insurance agent requested additional documents including the police report and photos of the damaged car.
I submitted all the requested documents promptly including the accident report and repair estimates.
An investigation has begun to assess the vehicle damage and determine the cause of the accident.
The investigation report is complete, confirming the collision damage and reviewing liability factors.
The insurance company proposed a settlement amount based on the repair costs and investigation findings.
I provided feedback expressing my satisfaction with the quick response and thorough handling of my claim.
The claim was formally approved by the insurance company after reviewing all submitted materials.
Received confirmation that the settlement payment has been issued to cover vehicle repair expenses.
The insurance claim was officially closed following successful payment and resolution of the case.
All records and documentation related to the auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
